channel.title: BlazinRescuer || Need Graphic Artist || Ad Speciailist ||
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt][b]BlazinRescuer[/b][/size][/center]
[b]What we are?[/b] [u]A remake in our own eyes [/u] [code]This server is going to be the way I saw runescape. It is going to start slow, there is no bosses or rare drops in the game. Which will end up coming once the community grows. There is going to be holiday events, updates WILL happen weekly. Bugs will be fixed and suggestion will be taken into consideration.
Beta will count for those loyal players, they will get something for their achievements and support. same with any other player who puts the effort in, this sort of stuff wont be taken lightly like all servers.
This is how I saw runescape starting, at first there were only normal drops for a long time, then the game updated and you start seeing rare things. So, that is how I want this server turning out. I want it to mean something, In this server you can't get level cap and start farming and get full awesomeness armor in a week.
All of these things make this a unique experience for anyone who joins.[/code]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/34io31y.png[/img]
Our team is currently looking for: a Graphic [b]Artist[/b], Ad [b]Specialist[/b]
[b]Why choose us?[/b] Even though we are just starting out and are pretty small, we have potential and are starting to grow.
[code]PostPosted: Sat Sep 22, 2012 1:21 am
Drops: Men now have drops Chaos druids now have drops Rock crabs now have drops at ::train Chickens now have drops by cows in lumbridge
Staff only: Staff zone added ::staffzone
VIP Members(Loyal Members) Only: VIP Zone added
Donator Only: Donator shop added
Areas: Access to chickens and cows in lumbridge
Skills: All skills are now trainable
Rune essance: Added a quick way to mine rune essance
Shops: Added Fishing shop in catherby Added Farming shop in catherby Added Auruby Teleport to rune essance mine in Varrock Added Armour shop in varrock
Dungeons: Taverly dungeon added
Teleports: Varrock teleport added Lumbridge teleport added Edgeville teleport added Camelot teleport added ::train added Falador teleport added Ardounge teleport added
NPCs Some drops added(Can't remember them all.) Farmer's added for thieving Pet's coded God wars npc's started server sided
Areas Slayer tower added, canifis added, barrows added
Quests Cook's assistant is now doable
Mysql: votepoints added, highscores added, webclient started
Bugs: ::update bug fixed (caused dc'ing) [/code]
In-Game Name: Position: Msn/Skype: Additional Information:
[size=8pt]Even if you'd like to apply for something that isn't listed we'd be happy to look at your application![/size]

item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

[center][size=14pt]BlazinRescuer[/size][/center]

What we are?
A remake in our own eyes

[code]This server is going to be the way I saw runescape. It is going to start slow, there is no bosses or rare drops in the game. Which will end up coming once the community grows. There is going to be holiday events, updates WILL happen weekly. Bugs will be fixed and suggestion will be taken into consideration.

Beta will count for those loyal players, they will get something for their achievements and support. same with any other player who puts the effort in, this sort of stuff wont be taken lightly like all servers.

This is how I saw runescape starting, at first there were only normal drops for a long time, then the game updated and you start seeing rare things. So, that is how I want this server turning out. I want it to mean something, In this server you can’t get level cap and start farming and get full awesomeness armor in a week.

All of these things make this a unique experience for anyone who joins.[/code]

34io31y.png1016×492

Our team is currently looking for: a Graphic Artist, Ad Specialist

Why choose us?
Even though we are just starting out and are pretty small, we have potential and are starting to grow.
